ygData.subject: Concerning my leaving.
ygData.msgSnippet: I am going to leave this RPG very soon. Once the battle between Optimus Prime and Galvatron is finished. I want all of my characters to be my characters still.

Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

I am going to leave this RPG very soon. Once the battle between Optimus Pri=
me and Galvatron is finished. 

I want all of my characters to be my charac=
ters still. I will probaly be coming back, it's just now, with school and o=
ther things I cannot be taking the time.

As for Dachande and Battera, well=
 the Maximals will hopefully help them out. And when they do Dachande and B=
attera are Logo's, when she returns. Until then they will remain in stasis =
lock or something.

Magmatron will probaly be making a return appearance, w=
ith Cerberus so keep them safe for me, as for the rest of the names, have a=
t them.

As for Optimus, he will always be mine, no matter the outcome of t=
he battle. If I return this summer I might bring him back, until then I wou=
ld hope that he would not fall into the hands of anybody else. I might be R=
Ping him again.

Yanshosh, you are a great roleplayer and I hope that you k=
eep these wishes true, or something like that.

JP on the other hand, well =
not really, he's more on the other side of the fence from Yanshosh, you'll =
get what's coming to you, people like you always do.

KSLaww, sorry the Des=
trons are gone, hope it doesn't screw with anything you had planned.

And t=
o the rest, it's been great playing with you, and I hope to returne when sc=
hool is out, cause then I'll have time. I will see you all later.

Dachande=
, signing out.
